mainText:
Promo: "Bank of Entitlement - Because you deserve everything, even if you haven't earned it!"

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So there I was, strolling into a fancy restaurant like I owned the place-well, I practically did with my sense of entitlement. I demanded the best table, causing a scene until they moved a party of ten just to accommodate my royal presence. As I sat down, I decided I needed a personal chef for the evening. When the waiter informed me that wasn't possible, I threw a fit that would make a diva jealous.I loudly proclaimed, "If I can't have a personal chef, then I refuse to eat anything on the menu! I am a VIP, a connoisseur of fine dining, and I demand only the finest cuisine tailored to my whims!" People stared, some impressed by my audacity, others appalled. But did I care? Not a bit. I reveled in the attention, feeling like a modern-day king making his mark.After much commotion and several phone calls to the chef, a bespoke meal fit for a deity arrived at my table. Each bite was a symphony of flavors, each sip of wine a dance on my taste buds. As I finished my meal, the entire restaurant erupted into applause. Yes, they knew they had witnessed a true display of entitlement, a performance worthy of the highest accolades.And as I basked in the adoration of the onlookers, a sense of vindication washed over me. For in that moment, I knew that my entitlement had triumphed once again, proving that in a world of mere mortals, I was the unchallenged ruler of my own reality.
